title: ISic000341. Epitaph for Ceparius Nymphidianus
body:
Facsimile Images

d(is) ((·)) m(anibus) ((·)) s(acrum)
Ce((·))pa((·))ri((·))us
Nym((·))phi((·))di((·))a - ((·))
nus ((·)) vi((·))xit
5an((·))nis XXXIII ((·))
mater ((·)) phe((·))cit ((·))

Apparatus criticus

Text from Korhonen 2004

English translation

Sacred to the spirits of the netherworld. Ceparius Nymphidianus lived for thirty three years. His mother made this.

commentary
